interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10
Review Date: 2021/05/23
Store: GERSHION
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'}
Review Text: This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long!
Review Title: Beautiful pastel colors!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Glass Spray Bottles 16oz Refillable Container suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants (2 Pack，Blue)
RONGCHUANG
{'Brand': 'RONGCHUANG', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.36 Pounds', 'UPC': '768253664713'}
I got these to replace a bottle of cleaning solution that no longer worked. These bottles are made of glass so they are much sturdier than the typical plastic bottles. The blue glass also looks more "elegant" on a countertop if you plan to display it. There are 2 spray settings (fine mist and stream). I didn't have any issues with leaking. It comes with 2 16 oz bottles, 4 labels, 2 caps, and a funnel (not pictured because I somehow misplaced it already).
Looks nice on the counter
GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10
GERSHION
{'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'}
This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long!
Beautiful pastel colors!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Strong inclination towards glass containers for their sturdiness and aesthetic appeal, alongside a newfound appreciation for high-quality cosmetic products, particularly gel nail polishes. Values functionality in household items with features like adjustable spray settings.

- **Style & Aesthetics:** Prefers products that enhance home decor and looks elegant when displayed, indicating a comprehensive appreciation for design in both home and personal care items. The recent purchase of colorful gel polishes reflects a preference for vibrant aesthetics in personal grooming.

- **Practicality:** Chooses versatile items that can serve multiple purposes, including refillable containers for cleaning and aromatherapy, as well as cosmetic products that offer convenience and ease of use.

- **Quality Consciousness:** Demonstrates a strong focus on durable and non-toxic materials, preferring high-quality, sustainable products over plastic alternatives. The choice of long-lasting nail polishes complements this value.

- **Organizational Traits:** Enjoys having organized and labeled products, as seen in the previous preference for labeled household items and now evident with color-marked nail polish containers.

- **User Experience:** Values a seamless experience with products—whether ensuring no leaking in cleaning containers or obtaining easy application and opacity with nail polishes. 

Overall, the user emphasizes high-quality, stylish, and practical products that enhance both their home environment and personal aesthetic.
